pages.text: $(item)Cans$() can store any fluids with any amount. You can click with a full $(item)Bucket$() to fill it. When are multiple $(item)Cans$() in one slot fluid from $(item)Bucket$() will be divided. If $(item)Can$() has 1000 m🪣, you can empty it with $(item)Bucket$().$(br2)There is upgraded form of a $(item)Can$() named $(item)Capsule$() they can store from 2🪣 to 4🪣 instead of 1🪣.
